org.openmobster.cloud.api.sync
Interface Channel

All Known Implementing Classes:
BootChannel, CloudChannel, EmailConnector, EmailConnector, LargeObjectChannel, PhoneGapChannel, PluginJQueryChannel, QueryChannel, ServerConnector, ServerConnector, ServerConnectorMapping, ServerConnectorMapping, SyncStatusChannel, TicketChannel, TicketChannel, TicketChannel, TicketConnector, TwitterChannel, TXCheckChannel
public interface Channel

A Channel serves as a gateway for integrating on-device model/data objects with server side backend storage systems such as relational databases, content repositories, or Enterprise systems like CRMs, ERPs etc

Author:
openmobster@gmail.com

Method Detail

readAll

List<? extends MobileBean> readAll()
Reads all the Mobile Beans managed by this connector from the corresponding backend storage system

Returns:
a list of mobile beans

read

MobileBean read(String id)
Reads the Mobile Bean uniquely identified by the specified id from the backend storage system

Parameters:
id - must uniquely identify the Mobile Bean instance that needs to be read
Returns:
the Mobile Bean instance uniquely identified by the specified id

bootup

List<? extends MobileBean> bootup()
Reads a subset of all Mobile Beans from the backend storage that are enough to get a service functional on the device. This saves against loading up lots of unnecessary beans on the storage constrained device. How many/which beans to return are totally at the discretion of the service being mobilized and could even contain all the beans on the server

Returns:
a list of mobile beans

create

String create(MobileBean mobileBean)
Creates a new instance of the specified Mobile Bean within the backend storage system

Parameters:
mobileBean - the Mobile Bean that must be created
Returns:
unique identifier of the newly created instance

delete

Permanently deletes the specified MobileBean from the backend storage system

scanForUpdates

String[] scanForUpdates(Device device,
                        Date lastScanTimestamp)
Scan for any Mobile Bean modifications that need to be synchronized with the specified device

Parameters:
device - Device for which the data changes apply
lastScanTimestamp - timestamp when the last scan was done
Returns:
an array of Strings which represent the unique ids of the modified Mobile Beans
